prodNameC: "依免可" 固態血小板 IgG 抗體測試試劑組
ingredientsDesc:
Reagents:
1.	Capture-P Test Wells: coated with a specific platelet binding agent. (#0066246)
2.	Capture LISS: a low ionic strength solution containing glycine, bromcresol purple dye and the preservative sodium azide. (#006419, #006420, #006418)
3.	Capture-P Indicator Red Cells: a suspension of red blood cells coated with rabbit anti-human IgG. (#0066240)
4.	Capture-P Positive Control Serum (Weak): Containing andibody to platelets, Sodium azide. 3mL, (#0066248)
5.	Capture-P Negative Control Serum: containing no antibodies to platelets, Sodium azide. 3mL, (#0066248)
applicantAddr: 台北市士林區文林路７６５號３樓之１０

mdKind.mdKindMCodeName: A 臨床化學及臨床毒理學
mdKind.mdKindDCodeName: A.1660 品管材料(分析與非分析)
